synopsis.text:
Amidst the towering skyscrapers of Tokyo's Shibuya and Shinjuku districts, the echoes of the Edo Shogunate persist in 2026, confining Japan in an era of strict social stratification and segregation. In this alternate reality, the only avenue for upward mobility is through the thrilling and perilous world of live-streamed duels, known as 'KILLTUBE.'

Three outcasts, shunned by society and bound by fate, find themselves sharing a prison cell. Desperate to break free from their chains and challenge the oppressive social hierarchy, they embark on a daring journey through KILLTUBE. As they defy the odds and conquer adversaries, they transform from society's rejects into celebrated icons, amassing wealth and admiration in this age of grand duels.

However, their newfound fame unveils a hidden truth behind KILLTUBE, forcing them to confront the darker side of their path to glory. In a world that blends the essence of Edopunk with the relentless pursuit of power and prestige, these unlikely heroes must navigate the complexities of their newfound status and the shocking revelations that lie ahead.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
